btClient

Class RUBTClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • btClient.RUBTClient

  • public class RUBTClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main client class for CS352, BitTorrent project 1 The program is designed to load a .torrent file, interface with a tracker and a single peer and will download a single file (a JPEG) from that peer. The file is then saved to a hard disk. All communication is done over TCP.
    Author:
    Cody Goodman & Conrado Uraga

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        BencodingException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        This is the main method that is called upon program startup, this method is tasked with validating the program's arguments and then instantiating the other classes need to run the program. When the download is finished this method verifies that it has completed successfully
        Parameters:
        args - The name of the .torrent file to be loaded and the name of the file to save the data to, using the proper path and file extensions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        BencodingException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • validateArgs

        public static boolean validateArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Validates the command line arguments to see if the parameters are good. The program exits if the arguments are bad.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments from the main method.
        Returns:
        True if both arguments are valid, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getFileBytes

        public static byte[] getFileBytes(java.lang.String fileName)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  BencodingException
        Returns the byte array of a file to be used with Bencoder2.java. The byte array format is required as input to the Bencoder2 class. Requires jre7 or greater.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be converted to a byte array
        Returns:
        byte The torrent file represented as a byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        BencodingException

      • getTestPeer

        public static Peer getTestPeer(java.util.ArrayList<Peer> peers)
        Returns the specified peer for testing the RUBTClient
        Parameters:
        peers - the list of availible peers
        Returns:
        peer object for the test peer
